rukus.text: geunyeoga malhagil jogjangdeul-iyeo i il-e gwanhayeo jo-eonhae jusiyo neohuiga cham-yeohaji anhgoneun i il-eul gyeoljeonghaji moshagessso hani
geudeul-i daedabhagil jeohuiegeneunhimgwa yongmaeng-i issnaida myeonglyeonghasil geos-eul suggohayeo jusoseo
geunyeoga malhagil bola wangdeul-i han do-eub-e deul-eogal ttaeneun geu go-eul-eulpagoehago geu go-eul baegseongdeul-eul bicheon hage hanani geudeuldo geuleohalila
geuleomeulo naega geudeul-ege ha naui seonmul-eul bonaelini sasindeul-i eotteon eungdab-eul gajigo oneunji gida lyeo boja

geu sasin-i omae sollomon-i geudeul-ege malhagil neohuineun naege jaemul eul julyeohaneunyo hananimkkeseo naege jusin geos-i geubunkkeseo neohuiege jun geosboda na-eunila seonmul-eul mankkigha neun geos-eun naega anila neohuinila
dol-agala ulineun geudeul-i dae jeoghal su eobsneun gundaeleul ikkeulgo gaseogeugos-eulobuteo geudeul-eul chubanghalini geudeul-eun bulmyeong-yeseuleoun gul-yog-eul masbolila
geuga malhagil jogjangdeul-iyeo geu deul-i naege gwisunhayeo ogi jeon-e neohui jung-e nuga geu yeowang-ui ogjwaleul naege gajyeool su issneunyo
yeongma gaunde-ui han yojeong-i daedabhagil dangsinkkeseo jalileul il-eoseogi jeon-e jega geugeos-eul gajyeoogessna ida sillo jeoneun him-i ganghani mid-eojusoseo

seongseoui jisig-i pungbuhan jaga malhagil dangsin-i nunkkamjjag hal saie geugeos-eul gajyeoogessseubnida balo geuttaesollomon-eun geugeos-i jagigyeot-e iss-eum-eulbogoseo malhagil igeos-eun nae junim-ui eunhyelosseo ineun naega gamsahago iss neunji eunhyeleul mang-gaghago issneunji si heomhalyeo hasim-ila nugudeun gamsahaneunjaneun jasin-ui yeonghon-e gamsahaneun ja imyeo eunhyeleul mang-gaghaneun janeun hana nim-ui eunhyeleul geoyeoghaneun jaigeoneul sillo naui junim-eun pung-yowa jabilo chungmanhasim-ila
geuga malhagil geunyeoleul wihae geunyeoui ogjwaleul byeongyeonghala ulineun geunyeoga olh-eun gillo indodoeneunji a nimyeon indodoeji anihanji al su issnola

yeowang-i wass-eul ttae igeos-i dangsin-ui ogjwaibnikka lago mul-euni geuwa biseushabnida lago geunyeoga daedabhamaegeunyeoboda apseo jihyega buyeodoeeo ulineun hananimkke sunjonghago iss-eossseubnida lago sollomon-i malhayeossdeola
geunyeoga hananim oee usang-eul sungbaehan geos-i geunyeoleul banghwangke haess-eu ni sillo geunyeoneun bulsinja gaunde iss-eossnola

geunyeoege gung-gwol-e deul-eogala malhani gungjeon-eul bon geunyeoga geugeos-eul yeonmos-ila saeng-gaghayeo geunyeoui chimaleulgeod-eo ollimae sollomon-i igeos-eun yu lilo pyeongtanhage mandeun gungjeon-ila mal hani geunyeoga malhagil juyeo sillo jega joeleul jieossnaida jeoneun sollomon gwa deobul-eo man-yuui ju-isin hananim kke gwiuihanaida
